meanings.definition: To coat or treat with aluminum.
meanings.sent1: I will aluminize the car parts to make them shiny.
meanings.sent2: The factory aluminizes the metal sheets for better protection.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chef aluminize the cake with aluminum foil?
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to aluminize the room with brightness.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand appeared to aluminize everything it touched.

meanings.definition: To become coated or treated with aluminum.
meanings.sent1: The metal will aluminize over time due to exposure to the elements.
meanings.sent2: The old pots and pans aluminized after years of use.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur seemed to aluminize magically after rolling in aluminum foil.
meanings.sent4: His reputation started to aluminize, becoming more prestigious.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline aluminized as the sun set, reflecting its rays beautifully.
